name: Final Fantasy XVI
description: Final Fantasy XVI is an action RPG that follows the journey of Clive Rosfield in a high-fantasy world torn apart by war, political intrigue, and massive elemental creatures known as Eikons.

name: Baldur's Gate 3
description: Baldur's Gate 3 is a role-playing game set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe, where players navigate a deep narrative-driven story, make tough decisions, and engage in strategic turn-based combat.

name: Persona 5 Royal
description: Persona 5 Royal is a Japanese RPG where players control a group of high school students who double as vigilante Phantom Thieves, navigating daily life and an alternate world filled with supernatural enemies.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description: Tears of the Kingdom is a direct sequel to Breath of the Wild, offering an expansive open-world experience where players control Link to defeat enemies, solve puzzles, and save the kingdom of Hyrule.

name: Black Myth: Wukong
description: Black Myth: Wukong is a visually stunning action RPG inspired by the Chinese novel Journey to the West, where players control Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, in an epic mythological setting.

name: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring is an open-world action RPG set in a dark fantasy world created by FromSoftware and George R. R. Martin, featuring exploration, challenging combat, and a deep, mysterious narrative.
